name: MTI EDGE
tag_list: project-management-training, software-development, sap-consultants, cio-training, project-management, erp-implementation, sap-fico, sap-implementation, sap-maintenance, sap-upgrade, pimbok, pmi-tests, project-management-certification, training-center, sap
overview:
Provides flexible training programs & consulting to executives & managers in SAP, Oracle & Project Management. The best thing about MTI is that, they not only offer you comprehensive training , but also give you the on-the-job learning experience!

MTI provides you the edge to succeed in your professional career & projects. MTI accomplishes their mission by serving as a catalyst for collaboration between IT technology thought leaders worldwide and budding IT professionals.

Other than their personalized skill-based training programs for individuals, governments and corporations, MTI Edge offers S/W development & implementation globally across the world.

MTI Edge works as the crucial link between CIOs and large consulting houses by providing economical IT skills, cost-saving strategies and outsourcing solutions.
